name: James H. PYE, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, INSURANCE DEPARTMENT, William J. Sheppard, Insurance Commissioner

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: James H. PYE, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, INSURANCE DEPARTMENT, William J. Sheppard, Insurance Commissioner.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Order, 129 Pa.Cmwlth. 545, 372 A.2d 33, affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Arthur A. Kusic, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Guy J. DePasquale, Harrisburg, Robert P. Kane, Atty. Gen., Donald J. Murphy, Deputy Atty. Gen., Joseph Kenneth Hegedus, John H. Isom, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
387 A.2d 877
James H. PYE, Jr., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, INSURANCE DEPARTMENT, William J. Sheppard, Insurance Commissioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 22, 1978.
Decided June 23, 1978.
Arthur A. Kusic, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Guy J. DePasquale, Harrisburg, Robert P. Kane, Atty. Gen., Donald J. Murphy, Deputy Atty. Gen., Joseph Kenneth Hegedus, John H. Isom, Asst. Attys. Gen., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
